text: ee kamaththa athiwayi api ipadenne.

wisheshayen aragalayehi sahabhagiwimen sanwedi wu pudgalayange manobhawayan da wadagath balapamak athi karayi. ( 2010 janadhipathiwaranaya salakillata ganna ) samaharawita mewa ithihasayehi sandhisthanayan salakunu karana tharam balapam athikarana eewa wiya haka.

nagarika sanwardhana adhikariya sathu salamulla mahal niwasa sankirnayen niwasa labadimata katayuthu karana athara anathuru dayaka kalapaye jiwathwana janathawa wenuwen idiri masa 06 athulatha owun iwath kara ema ayatath sthira niwasa labadimata rajaya katayuthu karana bawa amathyawaraya wadiduratath mehidi sandahan kale ya.
ee kale lassanata innath loku kamaththak thibuna..
kawadath apata wina kala para indiyanuwan mewarath apita ...
apa wani duppath ratawal nirdaya andamin sura ka aarthika adhirajyayak godanangana jathiwadi rathu dhanawadayaki.
manawa ayithin sandaha wu pas awurudu salasmata mewara manawa himikam dina samarumen ida!
mama giya uge gedara.
wihara dewalagam sathu idam rajayata pawara ganne na - idam ...
wena ratawala thiyena sanskruthiyayi..
oya mini­hage kasippu perana golayo eewath mini­ssunta bonna dena­walu.”

oba maithripalanayak prakashaya kiyawala balanna.

yathurak nomathiwa pana ganwiya haki motar rathawala enjima nawathwimata athapasu wima nisa rathaya athulatha ekathu wuna kaban monoksayid wayuwa wisha wi pudgalayan gananawak miya gos athi bawa 'da niwyork tayims' puwathpath warthawaka dakwe.
mehi anthargatha kathawa sakewin meseya: ek samayaka apa bhagyawathun wahanse lehenun wasaya kala weluwanayehi siw wanak pirisata daham desamin wada wisu seka.
wagahani wandi nathiwa gowin wele..
ranil palanaya yatathe ema ilakkaya kara wegayen gaman karamin thibena ape rata aarthika washayen mulumaninma durwala wima kalaya pilibanda prashnayak pamanak wiya yuthuyi.
niwedaka: api halo kiyannane.

bodubala senawa thula athi anathura eya yi.
rosa mala hinawela mal peththak galawala makuluwata dunna.
me pilibanda athi janatha udyogaya pahadiliwama samaharawita oba balubalmata simawa-adu antharjalaya haraha wishesha kenek hamu wiya haki chinthanaye paminenne.
porata oona wune ganige pukayi huththayi than dekayi balanna misa muna balanna neweyi.

prajathanthrawadi ayithiwasikam, samaja samanathawa ha adhirajyawadayen awyaja nidahasa surakshitha karagatha haki eka ma balawegaya wanne, samajawadi-jathyantharawadi kriyamargayaka padanama matha kamkaruwange ha gowinge aanduwakata karana satana thula gramiya ha nagarika dugin thaman pitupasa rali karaganna kamkaru panthiya yi.
haya denaku paksha nayakayan sitiyadi dinesh gunawardhana manthriwarayata labadunne wenama paksha nayakayek nisa nowe, eekabaddha wipakshaye niyojithaya lesa.

kirubhakaran – damilahondama prawruththi niwedaka -chethana liyanage - sinhalaifran mohomad – damilamahina bonso - ingrisihondama rupawahini prawruththi warthakaranaya -wimarshana – mahawa nagollagama gaslabu waga winashaya - sirasadompe polisiyata paharadima - deranahondama prashna wicharathmaka wada satahana – obada lakshapathi mama da lakshapathihondama sangitha wada satahana - sadhu nadahondama kalina wadasatahana – siyambaalanduwe athage nikma yama - saman kumara ramawithramahondama warthamaya wada satahana – apuru iskole mahaththaya - mayuri wanaguruhondama deshapalana sakachchamaya wada satahana – rathu ira – buddhika kulasekarahondama adhyapanika wadasatahana - patibha - karaniya meththa suthraya – ranjiwani baddewithanahondama krida wadasatahana - stori of shri lanka test krikat – amantha wijesuriyahondama lama wadasatahana – hurubuhuti – akura – nalani dharmarathnajuriye wishesha sammanaranganaya -himali siriwardhana - sandagiri pawwapriyankara rathnayaka - sulangata enna kiyanna, kadadorashriyantha mendis – athkanda lihiniyawadasatahan:360loka sithiyamajuriye kusalatha sammanaranganaya:chamila aththanayaka – sanakeliyayi mayauddika premarathna – kapsuwahas kal, swayanjatha, bonda midumanura bandara rajaguru - swayanjatha, korale mahaththaya, maranayakjuriya magin pirinamanu labana sahathika pathra (ranganaya)pransi tehara - awurudu diyaniyathishuna perera - swayanjatha2010 wasare sammananiya nalikawa:swarnawahiniyawishesha pranama sammanayathilak gunawardhanarosmand senarathnaprathibha prabha gaurawa sammanayatoni ranasinhaprasad samarathunga

samastha lanka gowijana sammelanayen amathi harisanta abhiyogayak harisange wi mafiyawata jawipen abhiyogayak.badu denawa kiyala illana illana ganata rate sampath badu denawada - wasantha samarasinha mahatha .wasantha samarasinhagen yahapalanayata prashnayak.

eya parani mathiwarana prathipala hara wenath samikshana daththa matha padanam wuwak nowiya.
apa ara charya me charya ,mahacharya, ganithacharya pattam labuwo nowannoya.
waradakaruwanta daduwam kirima pilibadawa mulikawama balapana karunu gananawak pawathi.
